methods.name: public int findTokenStart(CharSequence text, int cursor)
methods.comment: * Returns the start of the token that ends at offset * cursor within text.

methods.name: public int findTokenEnd(CharSequence text, int cursor)
methods.comment: * Returns the end of the token (minus trailing punctuation) * that begins at offset cursor within text.

methods.name: public CharSequence terminateToken(CharSequence text)
methods.comment: * Returns text, modified, if necessary, to ensure that * it ends with a token terminator (for example a space or comma).

methodNames: public int findTokenStart(CharSequence text, int cursor)
public int findTokenEnd(CharSequence text, int cursor)
